definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.chinese: 他估计这枚戒指值80美元。

sentences.english: Then the lovely young mother showed the signet ring as proof.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻又迷人的母亲当众出示了图章戒指以作证明。

sentences.english: Multimode and silk aram put on the first bought ring, and was agreed.
sentences.chinese: 多模和丝兰戴上了最初买的戒指，并商定娶亲。

sentences.english: You hang your wedding ring over your belly and it moves in circles
sentences.chinese: 把你的戒指吊在肚子上方，戒指绕圈圈。

sentences.english: You hang your wedding ring over your belly and it moves in circles
sentences.chinese: 把你的戒指吊在肚子上方，戒指绕圈圈。

sentences.english: I want an amethyst ring, but I do not know what my ring size is.
sentences.chinese: 我要一只紫水晶戒指，但是我不知道我的戒指尺码。

sentences.english: I want an amethyst ring, but I do not know what my ring size is.
sentences.chinese: 我要一只紫水晶戒指，但是我不知道我的戒指尺码。

sentences.english: When cheng super real appeared was holding a ring to propose to tang sugar.
sentences.chinese: 当程超群真正出现的时候便是拿着戒指向唐糖求婚。

sentences.english: But I bought last year for my girlfriend a very nice diamond ring.
sentences.chinese: 但我去年给我女朋友买了一个很漂亮的钻石戒指。

sentences.english: As if to be more like a pedlar , I wear a silver ring.
sentences.chinese: 似乎为了更像一个小贩，我带着一只银戒指。

sentences.english: In the small box was the ring that he had given her twenty years before.
sentences.chinese: 那个小盒里面是那枚他二十年前送给她的戒指。

sentences.english: It is one of only ten yuan.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个只有十元钱的戒指。

sentences.english: As your wedding-ring wears, your cares will wear away.
sentences.chinese: 结婚戒指戴旧了，苦闷也就消除了。

sentences.english: Complete this on-trend look with the matching ring.
sentences.chinese: 和同款戒指搭配，打造本季的最时尚造型。

definition: ornamental thumb ring (originally a ring, often made from jade, worn by archers in ancient times to protect the right thumb when drawing a bowstring)
